mapper.select: select SUBJ_CODE, CTGR_CODE, MB_EMAIL, MB_NICK, SUBJ_NM, SUBJ_REGDATE, SUBJ_STARTDATE, SUBJ_ENDDATE from subject
SELECT mb_att_ctgr_code, mb_pwd, mb_addr, mb_birthdate, mb_sex, mb_phone, mb_reg_atrt, mb_joindate FROM member
SELECT mb_att_ctgr_code, mb_email, ctgr_code1, ctgr_code2, ctgr_code3, ctgr_code5, mb_marriage_yn, mb_child_yn, mb_home_yn, mb_car_yn FROM att_category

SELECT (SELECT Count(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM area WHERE Substr(mb_addr, 1, 5) LIKE '%' || #{area} || '%') WHERE ctgr_code = c.ctgr_code)AS count, c.ctgr_code, Round(( Ratio_to_report((SELECT Count(*) AS num FROM (SELECT * FROM area WHERE Substr(mb_addr, 1, 5) LIKE '%' || #{area} || '%') WHERE ctgr_code = (SELECT ctgr_code FROM category WHERE ctgr_code = c.ctgr_code))) OVER() * 100 ), 2) || '%' PERCENT, c.ctgr_nm FROM subject a, member b, category c WHERE a.mb_nick = b.mb_nick AND c.ctgr_code = a.ctgr_code GROUP BY c.ctgr_code, c.ctgr_nm ORDER BY ctgr_code

SELECT (SELECT Count(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT c.ctgr_code, c.ctgr_nm, b.mb_nick, b.mb_addr, b.mb_birthdate FROM subject a, member b, category c WHERE a.mb_nick = b.mb_nick AND c.ctgr_code = a.ctgr_code) WHERE Nvl(Trunc(Months_between(sysdate, To_date(Substr(mb_birthdate, 1, 4), 'YYYY')) /12), 0)BETWEEN #{startAge} AND #{endAge}) WHERE ctgr_code = c.ctgr_code)AS count, c.ctgr_code, c.ctgr_nm, Round(( Ratio_to_report((SELECT Count(*) AS num FROM (SELECT * FROM area WHERE Nvl(Trunc(Months_between(sysdate,To_date(Substr(mb_birthdate, 1, 4),'YYYY')) / 12), 0)BETWEEN #{startAge} AND #{endAge}) WHERE ctgr_code = (SELECT ctgr_code FROM category WHERE ctgr_code = c.ctgr_code))) OVER() * 100 ), 2) || '%' PERCENT FROM subject a, member b, category c WHERE a.mb_nick = b.mb_nick AND c.ctgr_code = a.ctgr_code GROUP BY c.ctgr_code, c.ctgr_nm ORDER BY ctgr_code

SELECT (SELECT Count(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT c.ctgr_code, c.ctgr_nm, b.mb_nick, b.mb_addr, b.mb_birthdate, b.mb_sex FROM subject a, member b, category c WHERE a.mb_nick = b.mb_nick AND c.ctgr_code = a.ctgr_code) WHERE mb_sex = #{sex}) WHERE ctgr_code = c.ctgr_code)AS count, c.ctgr_code, c.ctgr_nm, Round(( Ratio_to_report((SELECT Count(*) AS num FROM (SELECT * FROM area WHERE mb_sex = #{sex}) WHERE ctgr_code = (SELECT ctgr_code FROM category WHERE ctgr_code = c.ctgr_code))) OVER() * 100 ), 2) || '%' PERCENT FROM subject a, member b, category c WHERE a.mb_nick = b.mb_nick AND c.ctgr_code = a.ctgr_code GROUP BY c.ctgr_code, c.ctgr_nm ORDER BY ctgr_code

SELECT (SELECT Count(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM area WHERE mb_marriage_yn = #{marriage}) WHERE ctgr_code = c.ctgr_code)AS count, c.ctgr_code, c.ctgr_nm, Round(( Ratio_to_report((SELECT Count(*) AS num FROM (SELECT * FROM area WHERE mb_marriage_yn = #{marriage}) WHERE ctgr_code = (SELECT ctgr_code FROM category WHERE ctgr_code = c.ctgr_code)))OVER() * 100 ), 2) || '%' PERCENT FROM subject a, member b, category c WHERE a.mb_nick = b.mb_nick AND c.ctgr_code = a.ctgr_code GROUP BY c.ctgr_code, c.ctgr_nm ORDER BY ctgr_code

SELECT subj_regdate, subj_code, ctgr_nm, mb_nick, mb_sex, mb_birthdate, mb_addr, qst_img, subj_nm, subj_startdate, subj_enddate FROM (SELECT rownum rn,
subj_regdate, subj_code, ctgr_nm, mb_nick, mb_sex, mb_birthdate, mb_addr, qst_img, subj_nm, subj_startdate, subj_enddate FROM stats_table WHERE ctgr_nm LIKE '%'||#{ctgr_nm}||'%' AND mb_sex LIKE '%'|| #{mb_sex}||'%' AND Substr(mb_addr, 1, 5) LIKE '%'||#{mb_addr}||'%' AND Nvl(Trunc(Months_between(sysdate, To_date(Substr(mb_birthdate, 1, 4), 'YYYY')) /12), 0)BETWEEN #{startAge} AND #{endAge}
AND SUBJ_STARTDATE > to_char(sysdate,'yy/mm/dd')
AND subj_startdate <= to_char(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd') AND subj_enddate > to_char(sysdate,'yy/mm/dd')
AND subj_enddate <= to_char(sysdate,'yy/mm/dd')
AND rownum <=10) where rn >=1

SELECT count(subj_regdate) FROM (SELECT rownum rn, subj_regdate, subj_code, ctgr_nm, mb_nick, mb_sex, mb_birthdate, mb_addr, qst_img, subj_nm, subj_startdate, subj_enddate FROM stats_table
WHERE ctgr_nm LIKE '%'||#{ctgr_nm}||'%' AND mb_sex LIKE '%'|| #{mb_sex}||'%' AND Substr(mb_addr, 1, 5) LIKE '%'||#{mb_addr}||'%' AND Nvl(Trunc(Months_between(sysdate, To_date(Substr(mb_birthdate, 1, 4), 'YYYY')) /12), 0)BETWEEN #{startAge} AND #{endAge}
WHERE MB_NICK LIKE '%'||#{mb_nick}||'%' AND SUBJ_NM LIKE '%'||#{subj_nm}||'%')
)
AND SUBJ_STARTDATE > to_char(sysdate,'yy/mm/dd'))
AND subj_startdate <= to_char(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd') AND subj_enddate > to_char(sysdate,'yy/mm/dd'))
AND subj_enddate <= to_char(sysdate,'yy/mm/dd'))

SELECT (SELECT Count(d.asw_content) FROM subject a, question b, item c, answer d WHERE a.subj_code = b.subj_code AND b.qst_code = c.qst_code AND c.item_code = d.item_code AND b.qst_code = (SELECT b.qst_code FROM subject a, question b WHERE a.subj_code = b.subj_code AND a.subj_code = p.subj_code AND rownum = 1)) as count, subj_regdate, subj_code, ctgr_nm, mb_nick, mb_sex, mb_birthdate, mb_addr, qst_img, subj_nm, subj_startdate, subj_enddate FROM (SELECT rownum rn,
subj_regdate, subj_code, ctgr_nm, mb_nick, mb_sex, mb_birthdate, mb_addr, qst_img, subj_nm, subj_startdate, subj_enddate FROM stats_table WHERE ctgr_nm LIKE '%'||#{vo.ctgr_nm}||'%' AND mb_sex LIKE '%'|| #{vo.mb_sex}||'%' AND Substr(mb_addr, 1, 5) LIKE '%'||#{vo.mb_addr}||'%' AND Nvl(Trunc(Months_between(sysdate, To_date(Substr(mb_birthdate, 1, 4), 'YYYY')) /12), 0)BETWEEN #{vo.startAge} AND #{vo.endAge}
AND SUBJ_STARTDATE > to_char(sysdate,'yy/mm/dd')
AND subj_startdate <= to_char(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd') AND subj_enddate > to_char(sysdate,'yy/mm/dd')
AND subj_enddate <= to_char(sysdate,'yy/mm/dd')
AND rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) p where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} -1) * #{cri.amount}
GROUP BY subj_regdate, subj_code, ctgr_nm, mb_nick, mb_sex, mb_birthdate, mb_addr, qst_img, subj_nm, subj_startdate, subj_enddate order by subj_regdate desc

SELECT (SELECT Count(d.asw_content) FROM subject a, question b, item c, answer d WHERE a.subj_code = b.subj_code AND b.qst_code = c.qst_code AND c.item_code = d.item_code AND b.qst_code = (SELECT b.qst_code FROM subject a, question b WHERE a.subj_code = b.subj_code AND a.subj_code = p.subj_code AND rownum = 1)) as count, subj_regdate, subj_code, ctgr_nm, mb_nick, mb_sex, mb_birthdate, mb_addr, qst_img, subj_nm, subj_startdate, subj_enddate FROM (SELECT rownum rn,
subj_regdate, subj_code, ctgr_nm, mb_nick, mb_sex, mb_birthdate, mb_addr, qst_img, subj_nm, subj_startdate, subj_enddate FROM stats_table WHERE MB_NICK LIKE '%'||#{vo.mb_nick}||'%' AND SUBJ_NM LIKE '%'||#{vo.subj_nm}||'%'
AND rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) p where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} -1) * #{cri.amount}
GROUP BY subj_regdate, subj_code, ctgr_nm, mb_nick, mb_sex, mb_birthdate, mb_addr, qst_img, subj_nm, subj_startdate, subj_enddate order by subj_regdate desc
SELECT Nvl(Trunc(Months_between(sysdate, To_date(Substr(mb_birthdate, 1, 4), 'YYYY')) /12), 0) AS age FROM member
SELECT Count(*) FROM (SELECT mb_addr FROM member WHERE Substr(mb_addr, 1, 5) LIKE '%' || #{addr}|| '%')

SELECT DISTINCT a.subj_code, b.qst_code, c.item_code, b.qst_type, c.item_img, e.ctgr_nm, a.subj_nm, b.qst_content, c.item_content, (SELECT count(asw_content) FROM answer WHERE item_code = c.item_code)AS ASW_COUNT, ROUND(RATIO_TO_REPORT((SELECT count(asw_content) FROM answer WHERE item_code = c.item_code)) OVER(PARTITION BY b.qst_code),2)*100||'%' PERCENT, a.subj_startdate, a.subj_enddate, c.item_regdate FROM subject a, question b, item c, answer d, category e WHERE a.subj_code = b.subj_code AND b.qst_code = c.qst_code AND a.ctgr_code = e.ctgr_code AND a.subj_code = #{subj_code} AND b.qst_code = c.qst_code GROUP BY a.mb_nick, a.subj_code, b.qst_code, c.item_code, b.qst_type, c.item_img, e.ctgr_nm, a.subj_nm, b.qst_content, c.item_content, c.item_regdate, a.subj_startdate, a.subj_enddate order by qst_code desc, asw_count desc

SELECT DISTINCT a.subj_code, b.qst_code, c.item_code, b.qst_type, c.item_img, e.ctgr_nm, a.subj_nm, d.asw_content, b.qst_content, c.item_content, (SELECT count(asw_content) FROM answer WHERE item_code = c.item_code)AS ASW_COUNT, ROUND(RATIO_TO_REPORT((SELECT count(asw_content) FROM answer WHERE item_code = c.item_code)) OVER(PARTITION BY b.qst_code),2)*100||'%' PERCENT, a.subj_startdate, a.subj_enddate, c.item_regdate FROM subject a, question b, item c, answer d, category e WHERE a.subj_code = b.subj_code AND b.qst_code = c.qst_code AND a.ctgr_code = e.ctgr_code AND a.subj_code = #{subj_code} AND b.qst_code = c.qst_code AND c.item_code=d.item_code AND qst_type =1 GROUP BY a.mb_nick, a.subj_code, b.qst_code, c.item_code, b.qst_type, c.item_img, e.ctgr_nm, a.subj_nm, b.qst_content, c.item_content, c.item_regdate, a.subj_startdate, a.subj_enddate, d.asw_content order by qst_code desc, asw_count desc

SELECT Count(d.asw_content) FROM subject a, question b, item c, answer d WHERE a.subj_code = b.subj_code AND b.qst_code = c.qst_code AND c.item_code = d.item_code AND b.qst_code = (SELECT b.qst_code FROM subject a, question b WHERE a.subj_code = b.subj_code AND a.subj_code = #{subj_code} AND rownum = 1)

select a.subj_code,a.ctgr_code,b.ctgr_nm ,a.mb_email, a.mb_nick, a.subj_nm, a.subj_regdate, a.subj_startdate, a.subj_enddate from subject a, category b where b.CTGR_CODE = a.CTGR_CODE and (a.ctgr_code = (select CTGR_CODE1 from ATT_CATEGORY where MB_EMAIL = #{mb_email}) or a.ctgr_code = (select CTGR_CODE2 from ATT_CATEGORY where MB_EMAIL = #{mb_email}) or a.ctgr_code = (select CTGR_CODE3 from ATT_CATEGORY where MB_EMAIL = #{mb_email}) or a.ctgr_code = (select CTGR_CODE4 from ATT_CATEGORY where MB_EMAIL = #{mb_email}) or a.ctgr_code = (select CTGR_CODE5 from ATT_CATEGORY where MB_EMAIL = #{mb_email})) and read =0 group by a.subj_code,a.ctgr_code, a.mb_email, a.mb_nick, a.subj_nm, a.subj_regdate, a.subj_startdate, a.subj_enddate ,b.CTGR_NM order by subj_regdate desc
mapper.update: update subject set read = 1 where subj_code =#{subj_code}
